sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This fix script is to revert back to old native mobile "Recommended for you" cards from the new cards shipped as part of Utah next experience. This script is only for the customers who have upgraded to Utah and want to go back to old mobile views.</description>
        <name>Mobile Revert Next Exp - EC Core</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[//Switch runManually to true in order to run this script
var runManually = false;
if (runManually) {
    var util = new sn_me.MobileNextExpUpgradeUtil();
    revertRFYCard();
}

function revertRFYCard() {
    var rfy = [
        //Recommended For You Articles	
        {
            "masterItem": "f92d2b2feb3101103d6b2ff2a25228f7",
            "newCard": "3b0dbd55534d1110fedfddeeff7b1252",
            "oldCard": "5650b3efeb3101103d6b2ff2a2522884"
        },
        //Recommended For You Request
        {
            "masterItem": "8e21bbefeb3101103d6b2ff2a252281f",
            "newCard": "528cca51538d1110fedfddeeff7b12c8",
            "oldCard": "0c31fbefeb3101103d6b2ff2a25228ec"
        },
        //Recommended For You Request without image
        {
            "masterItem": "7d470fa4eb0201103d6b2ff2a2522818",
            "newCard": "228e4ad1538d1110fedfddeeff7b122b",
            "oldCard": "a8484be4eb0201103d6b2ff2a25228a3"
        }
    ];

    rfy.forEach(function revertEachLink(link) {
        util.switchConnection("sys_sg_master_item", "view_config", link.masterItem, link.newCard, link.oldCard);
    });
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-08-16 16:14:51</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3ef36c6653915110fedfddeeff7b12a5</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Mobile Revert Next Exp - EC Core</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Employee Center Core" source="sn_hr_sp">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Employee Center Core">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3ef36c6653915110fedfddeeff7b12a5</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-08-25 10:10:52</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>true</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Mobile Revert Next Exp - EC Core
